Dear
It is with great pleasure that we confirm that your five-year Graduate Research Supervisor Accreditation at Level 1 has been granted. Your accreditation certificate is attached for your records.
Ongoing Professional Development
There are a number of development opportunities available to experienced research supervisors to further develop and hone their supervisory skills. These professional development Master Classes and Good Practice Workshops are available all year round and are facilitated by experienced research supervisors and relevant experts.
All graduate research supervisors are encouraged to visit the Research Supervision Accreditation Program Booking System to view the current list of offerings and to make a booking.
Resources for Research Supervisors
There are numerous resources for research supervisors which you are welcome to access at any time.
Code of practice for supervision of doctoral and research master’s candidates, critical for all graduate research supervisors. Supervision resource page, Monash e-Research, Data Storage and Management, and Monash Supervisor Accreditation FAQ's.
Once again I’d like to congratulate you on your accreditation. If you would like to learn more about training for research supervisors, you can visit the website or contact us at MIGR-Membership@monash.edu.
